about_the_game: Error Found is a genre-redefining psychological-horror game that takes the place of a normal clicker game. When a seemingly normal clicker game gets hijacked by a character, players are forced to search for the truth within the game and make decisions that will forever impact their gameplay. Players and characters struggle to find what is real as the line between the game world and the real world becomes infinitely thin. Error Found creates an unforgettable replaying experience. With diverse endings and stories that depend on your own actions, Error Found is unforgettable.

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay includes adult topics such as suicide, drug abuse, and alcohol abuse. Players with epilepsy or sensitive to flashing lights may be affected by this game.

detailed_description:
Early Access Sale

Get 10% off when you buy the game now.


About the Game

Error Found is a genre-redefining psychological-horror game that takes the place of a normal clicker game. When a seemingly normal clicker game gets hijacked by a character, players are forced to search for the truth within the game and make decisions that will forever impact their gameplay. Players and characters struggle to find what is real as the line between the game world and the real world becomes infinitely thin. Error Found creates an unforgettable replaying experience. With diverse endings and stories that depend on your own actions, Error Found is unforgettable.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.0.04 or equivalent.
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 710 or equivalent.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.0.04 LTS
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: MacOS Mojave or higher.
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5‑7260U or higher.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD integrated graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: MacOS Monterey
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Silicon M1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.

name: Error Found

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Release 20H2 or higher.
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 710 or equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 or equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.

short_description: ERROR FOUND is a genre-redefining psychological horror game that takes place in a seemingly normal clicker game. When a previously normal game gets hijacked by a character, players are forced to find the truth within the game and make decisions that will forever impact their gameplay.
